basic.floral_language:
Fragaria × ananassa
Floriography: sweethearted, innocent, beautiful
Strawberry has a heart shape, bright fresh red color, juicy and full of fruit unique flavors of Rosaceae, has very high nutritional values and ornamental values. Flowers are 5-petaled, nearly round, white, pink, or rose color, cute and lovely. 
Strawberry likes sunshine, also tolerates shades, flowering in April to May and fruit producing in June and July.
basic.blooming: Fruit plants, flowering period April-May, fruiting period June-July
basic.color: Flower color white, fruit color red

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Fruits in high quality with adequate sunshine
maintenance.watering: Need a lot of water, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once every 7-10 days in the growing stage
maintenance.pruning: Remove creeping stem, old and disease leaves timely
